CustomField.description: Used to determine if a Service Appointment should be "auto-scheduled" when "auto-create service appointment" is ticked on the Work Type. This checkbox uses the Record Triggered Flow "MSN - Service Appointment - Record-Triggered Updates" to update the checkbox "Auto-Schedule" on the Service Appointment Record
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please tick this checkbox in order to auto-schedule new Service Appointments that get auto-created from the Work Type.
CustomField.label: Auto-Schedule Service Appointment
